description: APPLICATION FOR A LAWFUL DEVELOPMENT CERTIFICATE FOR ERECTION OF A REAR ROOF EXTENSION AND A SINGLE STOREY REAR EXTENSION
decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The operations comprising the erection of a single storey rear extension would consist of the enlargement of a dwelling house within the meaning of Class A of Part 1 of Schedule 2 to the Town & Country Planning (General Permitted Development)  (England) Order 2015 "the Order" and would comply with the development tolerances set out in said Class A. The operation would therefore have been granted planning permission by Article 3 of the Order.

Condition : 2 - The operations comprising the erection of a rear roof dormer would consist of the enlargement of a dwelling house within the meaning of Class B of Part 1 of Schedule 2 to the Town & Country Planning (General Permitted Development)  (England) Order 2015 "the Order" and would comply with the development tolerances set out in said Class B. The operation would therefore have been granted planning permission by Article 3 of the Order.

Condition : 3 - The operations comprising the installation of three velux style roof lights in the front roof slope would consist of any other alteration to the roof of the dwelling house within the meaning of Class C of Part 1 of Schedule 2 to the Town & Country Planning (General Permitted Development)  (England) Order 2015 "the Order" and would comply with the development tolerances set out in said Class C. The operation would therefore have been granted planning permission by Article 3 of the Order.

Condition : 4 - 
The applicant should be aware that the site may provide a useful habitat for Swifts. Swifts are currently in decline in the UK and in order to encourage and improve the conservation of Swifts the applicant is advised to consider the installation of a Swift nesting box/bricks on the site.
